## ThirdwebSDK.isReadOnly() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isReadOnly(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether the SDK is in read-only mode. (Meaning it has not been passed a valid "Signer.")
